otherNames: First Rate Master, A Decent Hitman, First-Class Master, Nhất Phẩm Cao Thủ, Top-ranking Kungfu Ace, Yipin Gaoshou, 一品高手, 古武術無双
synopsis: He has no special skills, but he mastered kung fu. The martial arts master, Duan Yun, came to a city, beats up rich people, and punishes gangsters. He also gives his affection to a high quality girl, a hot feisty cop, and cold business woman…
